sentences.sContent: "I see what I would consider a normal patient population, representative of the average experience most people are having, " Brooklyn optometrist Justin Bazan, a paid consultant to the Vision Council.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I see what I would consider a normal patient population, representative of the average experience most people are having, " Brooklyn optometrist Justin Bazan, a paid consultant to the Vision Council.
sentences.sCn: “我想我应该考虑哪些是一个正常的患者群体，平均代表有经验的大多数人。” 布鲁克林验光师贾斯汀·巴赞说道，他是视力协会的付费顾问。

remMethod.val: opto(眼睛) + metr(测量) + ist(表人) → 验光师， 视力测定者

words.tran: 验光；[眼科] 视力测定法

trans.tranCn: 验光师， 视力测定者
trans.tranOther: An optometrist is someone whose job is to test people's eyesight to see if they need glasses, and how strong their glasses should be
